title: [1.7.10] [ssp/smp][授权搬运][星系附属][个人汉化]Galaxy Space 星空mod
author: jrant
txt_content:
本帖最后由 jrant 于 2017-2-4 23:15 编辑 

注意版本1.1.3版本的星空最低需要GalactiCraft 3: 1.7-3.0.12.465作为前置
授权




QQ截图20160112203732.png (64.25 KB, 下载次数: 246)

下载附件

2016-1-12 20:47 上传






和其他星系附属mod兼容设置教程More-planet：首先打开 minecraft\config\MorePlanets.cfg找到




3`6QVNK8{}V5DBH}Z2809QF.png (4.09 KB, 下载次数: 386)

下载附件

2016-2-2 23:44 上传





改成falseExtraPlanets：首先打开 minecraft\config\ExtraPlanets.cfg找到
改成false之后重启MC即可
星系附属的加载顺序这样的加载顺序就是[星系附属02]-[星系附属00]附属mod[星系附属00]会覆盖其他mod的设置这张图是以星空mod为核心附属mod的设置下面这张图是以更多行星mod为核心附属mod的设置
教程到此结束

帖子更新记录2016.07.29准备更新2016.05.12更新1.0.9 STABLE2016.03.09更新1.0.8 STABLE2016.02.24更新1.0.7 STABLE2016.02.12更新1.0.6.1 STABLE2016.02.02更新1.0.6 STABLE2016.01.20更新1.0.5 STABLE2016.01.08更新1.0.4 STABLE2015.12.31更新1.0.3 STABLE2015.12.23更新1.0.2 STABLE2015.12.16更新1.0.1 STABLE
部分更新汉化1.1.3 STABLE1.修复喷气背包2.增加丢失的翻译文件3.修复比邻星的配置文件4.修复主菜单5.修复火卫一的英文翻译6.增加配置文件可以禁用甲烷的粒子效果7.巴纳德c的木头可以烧成木炭了8.甲烷会有伤害（wtf？很难闻吗？）9.星系mod的探测眼镜可以侦测到星空mod的矿物了10.增加宇航服模块11.修复因为防具的崩溃12.修复头盔的氧气消耗问题13.修复管道和燃油发电机的问题14.补充矿物词典
1.1.0 STABLE1.星图上添加天仓五星系2.巴纳德C添加新的树的生成3.添加金属方块4.添加新玻璃方块5.增加合成地牢萤石方块6.增加变换器表面(?)7.修改谷神星地牢8.土卫六方块修改进入元数据(优化的)9.巴纳德C添加神秘物品(有好处)10.修复金星的崩溃11.修复织女一12.主菜单小修复13.一堆乱七八糟的bug修复14.添加金星空间站15.配置文件能启用和关闭金星的雾

1.0.9 STABLE1.修复火星空间站2.修复群系配置文件3硫粉可以作为燃料使用4.恢复金星上的雾(与更多行星不兼容)5.木卫二增加冰层6.减少群系7.改变2阶热力充能套的合成8.增加太阳风发电板9.增加燃油发电机10.增加重力对铅套的影响(暂时)11.方块数据什么的转移到元数据(优化代码)12.增加发电机产生的能量配置文件13.岩浆发电机增加UI14.增加巴纳德C树木木板15.修复电动喷气背包的不科学掉落伤害16.修改维度ID17.修改火箭合成
1.0.8 STABLE1.暂时移除2阶热力靴的重力buff2.修改MC主菜单（可以修改配置文件修改）3.修复乱七八糟的bug4.修复乱七八糟的bug5.增加一把弓6.改变怪物的粒子效果7.改变巴纳德C的天空8.巴纳德C增加两个生物群系9.修复乱七八糟的BUG10-13.更新语言文件14.修复火星空间站15.加入织女一B
1.0.7 STABLE1.暂时移除星空图上的天仓五星系2.岩浆发电机在底部有岩浆也能发电3.增加锭和压缩版的数据4.移除水星的恒星辐射debuff5.木卫一网会造成伤害6.金星需要2阶热力充能套7.金星添加地底岩浆湖和洞穴里的岩浆8.添加金星的天空9.烈焰人(进化体)添加到水星和金星10.增加水星火山口的深度11.增加水星和金星的白昼时间(原来的4倍)12.修改金星的贴图和天空13.修复地牢的生成14.所有星球增加洞穴15.修改2阶热力布匹的合成16.火卫一的一天是MC中的12小时17.增加火卫一上看到的火星18.谷神星网会使你有凋零效果19.修复1-8阶火箭的合成20.更新翻译21.增加木卫二水下喷泉22.增加装饰方块：木卫一灰烬石及其合成23.增加木卫四的陨石频率24.修改配置文件能修改火箭合成25.增加新成就
1.0.6.1 STABLE1.修复服务器崩溃
1.0.6 STABLE1.修复木卫一灰烬，巴纳德C草方块，土卫二冰2.增加生成飞鱼座爬行蛇3.增加生成妊神星和冥王星的方块4.修复妊神星维度5.增加岩浆发电机6.修复2阶热力充能套7.增加电动喷气背包的3d模型8.修改巴纳德F的纹理9.修改巴纳德F环的角度10.修复柯伊伯带维度11.添加了生物群系的配置文件12.增加了飞鱼座爬行蛇的生命值
1.0.5 STABLE1.增加行星巴纳德F2.改变巴纳德E的地形3.增加装饰铅块4.巴纳德C的水替换成不明液体5.增加铅电池6.修复铂和秘银的生成7.修复成就“硅？真的吗？”8.修复成就“几乎全在星空！”9.修复土卫二的表面岩石10.增加自然之手的生成11.增加矮行星妊神星12.增加热力靴的升级版本“加强重力”13.降低火星空间站建造的需求14.修复2级热力充能套在optifine的显示15.修改冥王星（增加生物群系，改变纹理贴图）16.添加天空中天体的旋转17.修改巴纳德E的环18.替换月球的天空19.修复配置文件禁用火卫一的矿石20.加入怪物飞鱼座爬行蛇
1.0.4 STABLE1.加入木卫四2.添加冥王星和卡戎的月食3.增加8阶火箭4.修复6阶和7阶火箭的合成5.修改飞往南门二Bb和巴纳德星系需要的火箭阶数6.修改成就7.增加等离子工具的合成8.天卫四上观察天王星环现在能动了9.修复一些方块(用工具挖掘的时候，和其他)10.添加巴纳德C的触手怪

1.0.3 stable1.修复地牢boss的生成2.修复土卫六的石头3.增加一些关于地球的配置信息4.修复新年祝福信息的配置文件5.修改装饰铜块的贴图6.修复熔合机的合成7.增加使用电能的等离子工具8.增加巴纳德C草、蒲公英和灯笼花9.星图上增加巴纳德G10.星图上增加巴纳德星系小行星带11.巴纳德C现在天空中有云彩了12.增加 Debuff "太阳辐射"13.增加2级热力充能服14.巴纳德C增加彩虹水晶（挖掘后暂时掉落未知水晶）15.增加中文汉化文件
1.0.2 stable1.修复KCauldron服务器的崩溃2.修复某些石头乱生成在某些行星/卫星上3.修复在土卫二上观察土星的贴图4.增加行星巴纳德E5增加配置文件修改节日问候信息6.增加配置文件修改南门二Bb，巴纳德C，巴纳德E的使用
Revision 1.0.1 STABLE:1.移除南门二Bb乱七八糟的东西2.修复天卫三名称3.修复关闭火星空间站配置文件失效4.修复NASA工作台图纸5.增加电动喷气背包6.增加铅制装备7.修复发射火箭8.重置南门二Bb的怪物成为火焰属性
更新记录Revision 1.1.3 STABLE:1) Fixed Jetpack.2) Added missing localization.3) Fixed disable configuration unreachable planets to Proxima B.4) Fixed the main menu.5) Fixed localization Phobos blocks on the en_US locale.6) Added config disable particles from methane.7) Added Barnarda C wood burning recipes into charcoal.8) Methane now deals minor damage.9) Ores are connected to the sensor glasses of GC3.10) Added space suit modules.11) Fixed a crash because of the armor.12) Helmet costume is now consumes oxygen from ox. tanks and now does not break.13) Fixed a connection of pipes subject to fuel generators.14) Added missing OreDictionary.
Revision 1.1.0 STABLE:1) On Galaxy Map added T Ceti system.2) New generation trees on Barnarda C.3) Added metal blocks.4) Added Future Glass.5) Added Glowstone dusts and craft dungeon glowstones.6) Added Converter Surface.7) Changed dungeon on Ceres.8) Titan blocks transfered on metadata.9) Added treasures on Barnarda C.10) Fix crash on Venus.11) Fix Vega B.12) Small fix main menu.13) Other bugfixs.14) Added spacestation on Venus.15) Added config enable/disable fog on Venus.
Revision 1.0.9 STABLE:1) Fixed space station on Mars.2) Fixed config biomes.3) Sulfur can now be used as fuel in furnace.4) Returned fog on Venus. (There is a conflict with More Planets)5) Increased layer of ice on Europa.6) Reduced number of biomes (Removed 17 biomes).7) Changed craft Termal Padding Tier 2.8) Added Solar Wind Panel.9) Added Fuel Generator.10) Added effect of gravity for Lead Armor (Temporarily)11) Blocks transferred to Metadata.12) The configuration imposed rate of generation of energy from generators.13) Added visual interface, with tubes in Geothermal generator.14) Added planks of wood Barnarda C.15) Fixed the damage with Jetpack fall.16) Changed dimensions ID.17) Changed rocket craft.
Revision 1.0.8 STABLE:1) Temporarily removed gravity boots.2) Changed the main menu (Added config on \ off).3) Fixed a bug with hanging the fall to the surface.4) Fixed buckets.5) Added Quant Bow.6) Changed particles fire mobs.7) Changed sky color on Banranda C.8) Added 2 new biome on Barnarda C.9) Fixed count ingots in stack.10) Updated zh_CH.lang11) Updated zh_TW.lang12) Updated ru_RU.lang13) Updated en_EU.lang14) Fixed space station on Mars.15) Added Vega B planet.
Revision 1.0.7 STABLE:1) Temporarily removed from the Tau Ceti system Galaxy map.2) Added ability to generate energy from Geothermal Generator if set the lava block in the bottom.3) Added metadata for ingot and contraction.4) Removed the effect of solar radiation on Mercury at Y <= 30.5) The dungeon IO replaced the web on inflicts damage.6) On Venus now needs a thermal suit tier 2.7) On Venus added underground lava lake and added the lava in caves.8) On Venus added clouds.9) Added Evolved Blaze on Venus and Mercury.10) Increased depth of craters on Mercury.11) Day of Mercury and Venus increased in 4 times.12) Changed the sky of Venus and texture blocks.13) Fixed spawners on dungeons.14) Added caves almost all celestial bodies.15) Changed craft thermal cloth tier 2.16) Day on Phobos now make up 12 minecraft hours.17) Increased Mars on sky Phobos.18) The dungeon Ceres replaced the web on withering.19) Fixed recipes rockets tier 1-8.20) Update langs.21) Added underwater geyser on Europa.22) Added dual decorate stone old IO and recipe.23) Increased frequency of craters on Callisto.24) Changed config enable\disable improved rockets craft (You can now disable the need for the old level of rocket in craft).25) Added new achievements.
Revision 1.0.6.1 STABLE:1) Fixed server crash
Revision 1.0.6 STABLE:1) Fixed block IO Ash, Barnarda C Grass, Snow Enceladus.2) Added spawn mob Volneskor.3) Added localization Haumea and Pluto blocks.4) Fixed Haumea dimension.5) Added Geothermal Generator.6) Fixed craft Thermal Cloth Tier 2.7) Added 3D model for Jetpack.8) Changed texture block Barnarda F.9) Changed angle pitch ring on Barnada F.10) Fixed Kuiper Belt dimension.11) Added configs for bioms.12) Increased the number of lives "Volneskor".
Revision 1.0.5 STABLE:1) Added Barnarda F planet.2) Changed generation on Barnarda E.3) Added Decorate Lead Block.4) On Barnarda C replaced water on the unknow liquid.5) Added Lead Battery.6) Fixed generation Platinum and Mithril.7) Fixed Achievement "Silicon? Really?"8) Fixed Achievement "Almost in space!".9) Fixed Encelade surface block.10) Added localization for Tentacle.11) Added dwarf planet Haumea.12) Added upgrade for Thermal Boots - "Reinforced Gravity".13) "Space Station Base" on Mars SS lovered on 1 block.14) Fixed display thermal armor level 2 with mod Optifine.15) Changed Pluto (Add Biome, change textures blocks).16) Added rotation of stars in the sky.17) Changed rings Barnarda E.18) Replaced sky in Moon.19) Fixed config disable ores on Phobos.20) Added mob Volneskor.
Revision 1.0.4 STABLE:1) Added moon Callisto.2) Added effect "Eclipse" on moons and Pluto.3) Added Rocket Tier 8.4) Fixed craft rockets tier 6 and 7.5) Changed need tier rocket for aCentauriBb and Barnard's System.6) Chanded Achievements.7) Added craft Plasma tools.8) Uranus Ring on Oberon now transparencies.9) Fixed some blocks (Mining the wrong pickaxe, shovel, and so on).10) Added monster "Tentacle" on Barnarda C.11) Added localization for Evolved Cold Blaze.12) Blaze populated on distant planets \ moons of our system.
Revision 1.0.3 STABLE:1) Fixed spawn bosses in the dungeons.2) Fixed generation stone on Titan.3) Added config off Lead generation on Earth.4) Fixed the config off the New Year message.5) Change texture of Decorate Copper Block.6) Fixed craft Assembly Machine.7) Added Plasma instruments with electric charge.8) Added third dandelion on Barnarda C.9) On map added Barnarda G.10) On map added Barnarda Asteroids.11) On Barnarda C added clouds.12) Added Debuff "Solar Radiation".13) Added Thermal Suit Tier 2.14) On Barndarda C added Rainbow Crystal (temporarily drop Unknow Crystal)15) Added Chinese lang.
Revision 1.0.2 STABLE:1) Fixed crash on server KCauldron.2) Fixed generation stones on planets/moons.3) Fixed texture Saturn on Enceladus.4) Added Barnarda E planet.5) Added config enable/disable holiday message.6) Added configs enable/disable aCentauriBb, Barnarda C, Barnarda E planets.
Revision 1.0.1 STABLE:1) Remove incomprehensible on Centauri Bb.2) Fixed the name of the moon Titania.3) Fixed the config off Space Stations Mars.4) Fixed Schematics NASA.5) Added Jetpack.6) Added Lead Armor.7) Fixed pushing of rockets.8) Monsters aCentauri Bb replaced by fire.
Revision 1.0.0 BETA:1) Rewrited the code structure of all add-on.2) Rewrited all generators planets \ moons.3) Transfered dungeon tier 4 with IO on Ceres.4) Transfered dungeon tier 5 with Venus on IO.5) Changed craft rockets 1, 2 and 3 levels.6) New GUI textures for NASA WorkBench.7) New mechanism - Assembly Table.8) New textures for Dungeon Bricks Ceres, Enceladus, Proteus, Pluto.9) Improve the image of the planets in the sky10) Changed models from rockets 4,5, 6 and 7 Tiers11) Added ravine on Enceladus12) Added all moons Gases Giant on Galaxy Map13) Added on all planets/moons biomes14) Added BiomeDictionary for all biomes15) Added more configuration addon16) Added system update rocket on crafts rockets in NASA Workbench.17) Fixed slime texture on Proteus.18) Added Barnarda System with habitable planet (-4C - +12C)19) Remove the orbits of the stars aCentauri B and Proxima Centauri.20) Added Rocket Module for crafting rockets.21) Added compatibility with addons More Planets and Amun-Ra.22) Added Vega System on Galaxy Map.23) Added ingots, wafers, ores: Lead, Duralumin, Nickel, Cobaltum, Platinum, Magnesium, Wolframium, Adamantite, Mithril, Oriharukon.24) Added check system version and the add direct links to download the new version.25) Added glowstone in each dungeon.26) Added generation of lead ore in the world.27) Added Methane bucket.
添加的星球和卫星这个mod还是测试版本，很多东西没有加它增加了太阳系的一些行星和卫星还有别的星系，当然有些是不能登陆的只是一个图标谷神星火卫一火卫二木卫一木卫二木卫三木卫四土卫一土卫二土卫三土卫四土卫五土卫六土卫八天卫一天卫二天卫三天卫四天卫五海卫一海卫八冥王星冥卫一(卡戎)柯伊伯带妊神星鸟神星阋神星
南门二星系南门二A南门二B南门二Bb比邻星
巴纳德星系巴纳德星巴纳德B巴纳德C巴纳德D巴纳德E巴纳德F巴纳德G巴纳德星系小行星带
织女星系织女一织女一B织女一C织女星系小行星带
天仓五星系天仓五天仓五E
成就包括了10个以上的成就
关于安装mod注意星系mod的版本一定要406及以上这个mod可以和more-planet兼容more-planet的火星空间站要在配置文件里关掉即可more-planet版本必须要在1.3.0-Pre-6及以上forge版本推荐在1558以上推荐JAVA8
以往版本以往版本作者在原网站上已经撤掉了

我们的征途是星辰大海！
自己单人汉化难免有些错误希望有能给我一些建议

replies.txt_content: {:10_499:}楼主啊…………为啥我安装更多行星mod、星系mod和这个mod搭配会闪退？没有英文提示，直接开启界面过一会闪退

replies.author: jrant
